rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.20+commit.a1b79de6"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"sliceIndex","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"maker","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"taker","type":"address"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"makingAmount","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"takingAmount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"SliceFilled","type":"event"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"sliceIndex","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"address","name":"maker","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"makingAmount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"takingAmount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"onSliceFilled","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"This contract receives callbacks when limit orders are filled and emits events for tracking.      It holds no state and has no custody of funds - purely for event logging.","events":{"SliceFilled(uint256,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"maker":"Address of the original order maker (treasury wallet)","makingAmount":"Amount of maker token that was spent","sliceIndex":"Zero-based index of the slice that was filled","taker":"Address that filled the order","takingAmount":"Amount of taker token that was received"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"onSliceFilled(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"The taker address is derived from tx.origin since LOP doesn't pass it directly","params":{"maker":"Original order maker address","makingAmount":"Amount of maker token spent in this fill","sliceIndex":"Index of the TWAP slice (encoded in interaction data)","takingAmount":"Amount of taker token received in this fill"}}},"title":"TwapLogger","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"SliceFilled(uint256,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a TWAP slice is filled"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"onSliceFilled(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Called by 1inch LOP when an order with this interaction is filled"}},"notice":"Minimal, stateless contract that logs TWAP slice fills via 1inch LOP interaction callbacks","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/TwapLogger.sol":"TwapLogger"},"evmVersion":"shanghai","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/"]},"sources":{"contracts/TwapLogger.sol":{"keccak256":"0x67fa5a821c9bb774de5c5ab28b6ddf123bd644c8a8efefe9b5fe1b39b85dcfef","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://330050234d5df815e8b52286eb3e886e3ebdfc99df0bdc21cfc95dda995d386a","dweb:/ipfs/QmYRdpf55EsPQKWmoYDjdQi2fMR9eMDKL1tGT6ELxfiLJB"]}},"version":1}

onSliceFilled(uint256,address,uint256,ui.details: The taker address is derived from tx.origin since LOP doesn't pass it directly

params.makingAmount: Amount of maker token spent in this fill
params.sliceIndex: Index of the TWAP slice (encoded in interaction data)
params.takingAmount: Amount of taker token received in this fill

onSliceFilled(uint256,address,uint256,ui.notice: Called by 1inch LOP when an order with this interaction is filled
